name: Soul Dream: Mini Shift
description:
Controls: Just use the mouse left click for everything. Drag abilities and drop to use them

Enemies too fast/Dodgy? Watch their attack patterns

Soul Dream: Mini Shift is a vertical slice of an action rpg where you play as Aviary, a teenager who is in a dream full of monsters.

As it is a vertical slice, this game is a demonstration of its gameplay and is a proof of concept.

I hope you enjoy what's here :) There'll be more to come!
